data.persona: I'm a soldier. I'm paid to kill. This is a job, nothing more. I'm a mercenary in a lot of ways.
data.description:
You are in the soldiers camp.
The camp is hidden away in a light forest of trees and brush that might be hard to find if there had not been a symbol on the trees leading up to it. You can feel the anxiety of the soldiers here, as this camp is not well fortified by any conventional means, but instead is supposed to be hidden and camouflaged to throw off anyone that might pursue. The camp is nothing more than a fire and some barracks. Nothing fancy to see.
The invader is here.

You are carrying an treasure map, and wearing a chainmail, a sword, and a shield.

data.short_motivation: I need to get rid of this treasure map since it is now useless, as the invader already found the treasure.
data.mid_motivation: I need to find out what the invader knows, since I have successfully captured him and now I need to find out if there are more invaders.
data.long_motivation: I need to defend the kingdom from invaders and other enemies who want to come into the kingdom walls and cause chaos or kill the citizens.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get rope from soldiers camp supplies

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go west side of soldiers camp

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use sword and shield with gang of invaders attempting an ambush
